Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.VaticanRoute

Class VaticanRoute

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.VaticanRoute.VaticanRoute
public class VaticanRoute extends Object
Represent the vatican route where player token could moves during the game

  • Method Details

    • getInitialPosition

      public int getInitialPosition​(int playOrder)
      Get initial position of the tokens based on players order are in the game
      Parameters:
      playOrder - number of player in the game
      Returns:
      starting position

    • addPlayer

      public VaticanToken addPlayer​(String username)
      Add a token to the route with the username equals to the one specified as parameter
      Parameters:
      username - username of the player to add to the route
      Returns:
      a new token with the username specified

    • addPlayer

      public boolean addPlayer​(VaticanToken token)
      Add the token as parameter to the to the token list
      Parameters:
      token - token to add to the vatican route
      Returns:
      true if the token is correctly added, false if the token has a position greater than the last vatican report reached

    • getTokenList

      public ArrayList<VaticanToken> getTokenList()

    • getPopeSpaceReached

      public int getPopeSpaceReached()

    • setTokenPosition

      public void setTokenPosition​(VaticanToken token, int points)
      Methods who change a token position
      Parameters:
      token - is the token to modify
      points - is the amount to add to the token position

    • getRouteVictoryPoints

      public void getRouteVictoryPoints​(VaticanToken token, int lastAllowedPosition, Function<Integer,​Integer> positionGetter, Function<Integer,​Integer> pointGetter)
      Methods who increment a token victory points based on it's position
      Parameters:
      token - is the token to modify
      lastAllowedPosition - is the maximum position allowed
      positionGetter - given an input return a position below lastAllowedPosition
      pointGetter - given a input below lastAllowedPosition it returns a int

    • canStartVaticanReport

      public boolean canStartVaticanReport​(int lastVaticanReport, int position, int triggerPosition)
      Methods who check the activation of a vatican report
      Parameters:
      position - position to check
      triggerPosition - position of the vatican report
      Returns:
      true if the report is can start, otherwise false

    • advance

      protected void advance​(VaticanToken token, int points)
      Advance the position of the selected token by the number of points specified as parameter.
      Parameters:
      token - token which to advance its position
      points - points to add to the older position
      See Also:
      the method generate a message with the information of the token's new position

    • applyVaticanReport

      public void applyVaticanReport​(List<VaticanToken> tokens, int lowerLimit, int popesFavorVictoryPoints)
      Apply the vatican report to the tokens of the list that have a position greater or equals than the lower limit
      Parameters:
      tokens - list of the token in the route
      lowerLimit - limit to check to receive the vatican report
      popesFavorVictoryPoints - points to assign if the vatican report is activated
      See Also:
      the method generate a message with the list of player who activated the vatican report
